title: Spring-cleaning
text: During the general cleaning process, we remove dust and dirt from wherever it may be, even in the most difficult to reach places.

title: Supportive cleaning
text: We wash floors, remove dust, polish glass, polish furniture

title: Cleaning after construction
text: We wash windows, remove large and small debris, clean furniture, etc.

title: Window cleaning
text: Cleaning glass from dirt, wet washing the frame, washing ebbs, window sills, slopes

title: Cleaning of offices
text: Daily cleaning, one-time general cleaning, interior window cleaning

title: Daily cleaning of premises
text: Daily cleaning of office premises includes comprehensive cleaning and maintaining cleanliness throughout the working day.

title: Wife for an hour
text: The whole range of housekeeping activities. Preparing the house for the arrival of guests, preparing treats, cleaning after the event

title: Washing of facades, billboards, banners
text: We will help you keep your billboard, banner, sign (at the entrance to a store, building) clean and presentable.

title: Dry cleaning of upholstered furniture
text: We will help you quickly update and refresh your interior, getting rid of dust, plaque, mites, microorganisms, stains of any nature

title: Dry cleaning of carpets and rugs
text: Periodic dry cleaning of carpets using professional means can restore their newness, freshness and beauty.t
